subject: detection condition
subject code: whether we did detection (1) or orientation discrimination (2)

subject: sizeX
subject code: size of the stimulus in dva x direction

subject: sizeY
subject code: size of the stimulus in dva y direction

subject: true position
subject code: which interval contained the signal: 1 or 2

subject: response
subject code: which interval was selected by the subject 1 or 2
